gameintro.content: My toy plushie is stuck on the penguins' ice. Help me get it out!

gameintro_back.content: Welcome back! My plushie is STILL on the penguins' ice. Help me get it out!

gameindex.content: Play a level or create your own!

levelintro_basic1.content: Look! My plushie is there on the ice!

levelintro_basic2.content: Use the cannon to push a fish at the plushie. Can you get it to the target?

levelintro_slideforce.content: Slide this to choose the force you need - that's what powers all this pushing.

clickpush.content: Tap the "push" button to launch a fish!

levelintro_movecannon.content: The force slider is locked so move the cannon to line it up with the Plushie and the target!

levelintro_alladjustments.content: Now you can move the cannon and change the force slider. Use them both to get the Plushie into the target!

levelintro_sand.content: What does this patch of sand do?

levelintro_penguin.content: Penguins are in the way! Bounce the plushie off the wall. Aim at the star!

levelintro_icehole.content: Watch out for the hole in the ice!

levelintro_prediction_clickice1.content: Tap on the ice to put a target where you think the Plushie will land.

levelintro_prediction_def.content: Predicting is saying what is going to happen before it happens.

levelintro_prediction_target.content: Where do you think the Plushie will land this time?

levelintro_prediction_clickice2.content: Tap on the ice to make your prediction.

levelintro_prediction_stars.content: Predict which stars the Plushie will hit this time.

levelstart5.content: I wonder what will happen next!

leveltype_force1.content: What force will we need to get the Plushie to the target?

leveltype_force2.content: Set the slider to get the Plushie to the target.

leveltype_force3.content: Set the force to get the Plushie to the target.

leveltype_clear1.content: Move the cannon to line it up with the Plushie.

leveltype_penguin1.content: How can you get around that penguin?

leveltype_penguin2.content: There's a penguin on the ice. You might need to move the cannon.

leveltype_penguins1.content: These penguins keep getting in the way!

leveltype_penguins3.content: How can you avoid all those penguins?

leveltype_icehole1.content: Watch out! There's a hole in the ice.

leveltype_icehole2.content: Don't fall into that hole in the ice.

leveltype_movingpenguins2.content: Can you get the plushie to the target without hitting a moving penguin?

leveltype_sand1.content: Hm! Looks like there's a patch of sand on the ice.

leveltype_sand2.content: What will that patch of sand do to the Plushie?

leveltype_bank.content: Bounce the plushie off the wall.

leveltype_bonusstar.content: Aim for the star on the way to the target.

leveltype_bonusstars.content: Aim for those stars on the way to the target.

leveltype_movecannon.content: Move the cannon to get the plushie to the target.

levelintro_setforce.content: Set the force on the slider so the plushie will get to the target.

levelintro_cannonforce.content: Move the cannon and set the force on the slider to get the plushie to the target.

leveltype_predicttarget1.content: Tap on the ice to put a target where you think the Plushie will land.

leveltype_predicttarget2.content: Put the target where you think the Plushie will land

leveltype_predicttarget3.content: Where do you think the Plushie will land?

leveltype_predicttarget4.content: Predict which spot the Plushie will land in.

leveltype_predictstar1.content: Tap on the stars you think the Plushie will hit.

leveltype_predictstar2.content: Which stars will the Plushie hit?

fdbk_success_rightforce.content: You used just the right amount of force to push the plushie to the target.

fdbk_success_nopenguins.content: You got it to the target without hitting the penguins!

fdbk_success_offthepenguin.content: Way to bounce if off that penguin!

fdbk_fail_highforce_d.content: Oh, the Plushie went past the target!

levelintro_lowforce.content: Sometimes you only need a LITTLE force. Use the slider to choose how to get the Plushie into the target!

fdbk_fail_highforce_i.content: Was that the right amount of force?

fdbk_fail_highforce_p.content: What if you use less force?

fdbk_fail_verylow_i.content: Why didn't the fish reach the Plushie?

fdbk_fail_lowforce_i.content: I wonder if more force would do it?

fdbk_fail_lowpenguin_d.content: Oh, it bounced off a penguin!

fdbk_fail_lowpenguin_i.content: Was that the right amount of force?

fdbk_fail_lowsand_i.content: What happened when the Plushie hit that sand?

fdbk_fail_lowsand_p.content: How can we get the Plushie to move better through the sand?

fdbk_fail_verylowsand_d.content: The fish didn't hit the Plushie!

fdbk_fail_verylowsand_i.content: What happened when the Plushie hit that sand?

fdbk_fail_verylowsand_p.content: How can we get the Plushie to move better through the sand?

fdbk_fail_timing_p.content: Watch out for those moving penguins!

fdbk_fail_timing_i.content: Can you predict where the Plushie will go so it doesn't hit a penguin?

fdbk_fail_timingfish_d.content: Watch out for those moving penguins!

fdbk_fail_timingfish_i.content: How can you keep from hitting the moving penguins?

fdbk_fail_iceholepenguin_d.content: Bouncing off that penguin sent the Plushie right into the hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_iceholepenguin_p.content: Maybe it won't go into the ice if it doesn't hit that penguin

fdbk_fail_nomove.content: You can move the cannon to get a better shot.

fdbk_fail_icehole_d1.content: Oh no, my Plushie fell into the hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_icehole_p1.content: Watch out for that hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_icehole_d2.content: Aw, right in the hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_icehole_d3.content: Nothing seems to get past that hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_icehole_p2.content: Go around that hole in the ice!

fdbk_fail_penguinfish_d.content: Hm, it bounced off a penguin.

fdbk_fail_penguinfish_i.content: How can we keep from hitting the penguin?

fdbk_fail_penguinfish_p.content: Maybe you need to move the cannon.

fdbk_fail_wall_i.content: Where should you move the cannon to get the Plushie into the target?

fdbk_fail_penguin_d.content: Hm, it bounced off a penguin.

fdbk_fail_penguin_i.content: How can you keep from hitting the penguin?

fdbk_fail_penguin_p.content: Maybe you need to move the cannon.

fdbk_fail_missedbank_d.content: Did you see how it moved that time?

fdbk_fail_missedbank_p.content: Try bouncing it off of a wall

fdbk_fail_missedpenguin_d.content: Did you see how it moved that time?

fdbk_fail_missedpenguin_p.content: Maybe you need to bounce if off something

fdbk_fail_position_p1.content: You may need to move the cannon

fdbk_fail_position_p2.content: You can move the cannon to get a better shot.

fdbk_fail_predict1.content: Hm, not quite what you thought

fdbk_fail_predict3.content: How close was it to your prediction?

fdbk_fail_starsnochoice.content: Don't forget to choose which stars you think the Plushie will hit.

fdbk_fail_starsnone1.content: Were you surprised where the Plushie went?
I was a little surprised. Yeah.
I, look, I knew you were not aiming correctly
I just didn’t want to say anything 'til you did. Because, you know, trial and error.

fdbk_fail_starsnone2.content: The Plushie hit different stars than you predicted.

fdbk_fail_starssome.content: Looks like you were right about SOME of those stars!

fdbk_fail_choseall.content: The Plushie didn't hit all of the stars.

fdbk_fail_starsmix.content: How close was it to your prediction?

fdbk_fail_starsall.content: It hit every star you predicted! And it hit more stars too.

createindex_full.content: You can edit or play a level you already created. To make a whole new level, you can edit one you've already made.

create_drag.content: Drag objects on to the ice to create your own level!

create_friend.content: Try it yourself or with a friend.

create_hitplay.content: Hit Play when you're ready to test out your level or invite someone to try it out!

create_useslider.content: Use the slider to choose the force of the push - that's how hard you will throw the fish. The harder the push, the faster and farther it will move.

create_getplushie.content: Can you get the plushie onto the target?

create_seewhathappens.content: Test it out and see what happens!

create_changeanything.content: You can change anything before you try again!

create_moveany.content: Move any pieces you'd like before you try another fish!

create_clear.content: Tap CLEAR to move everything off the ice.

hinttool.content: Use the hint tool to see where the plushie will go.

misc_farenough.content: I wonder if the plushie will go far enough.

misc_willstop.content: Do you think the plushie will stop on the target?

misc_force.content: How much force do you think the plushie needs to stop on the target?

misc_better.content: Are you getting better at guessing where it will go?

misc_moreorless.content: Do you think it helps to use more force or less?

misc_remember.content: How are you remembering what works and what doesn't?

misc_whatchange.content: What can you change to get a better shot?

misc_noteforce.content: See how much force you used that time.

misc_noteshot.content: Why is remembering your shot important?

misc_anotherway.content: Find another way to get the plushie to the target.

misc_launchfish2.content: tap the "push" button to launch a fish!

gameover_end.content: Congratulations! You're finished! You can lie down now.

gameover_again.content: You're all out of fish! Great job!

gameover_else.content: You can now get a degree in Penguinology! Yes, it's real.

misc_home.content: You can start the level over anytime. Just hit the home button, and I'll tell you what to do next.

misc_close.content: Tap the close button to play some more.

fdbk_forcelocked_alt.content: You can't change the force on this round.

fdbk_cannonlocked.content: The cannon is locked in this position.

fdbk_cannonlocked_alt.content: You can't move the cannon on this round.

levelintro_prediction_locked.content: You can't change the force OR move the cannon on this round.

levelintro_prediction_look.content: Look at how the force is set and where the cannon is.

fdbk_fail_morestars.content: The plushie hit more than one star.

nextorretry.content: Tap Next to try another level or Retry to try this level again.

retry.content: Tap Retry to try this level again.

zamboni.content: Here's Chet, clearing the ice! You did 20 levels! Do you want to keep playing?

fdbk_fail_onemorestar.content: It hit one more star than you predicted.

levelintro_prediction_clickstars.content: Tap on ALL of the stars you think the Plushie will hit.

levelintro_prediction_morestars.content: You can choose more than one star.

levelintro_prediction_def_alt.content: Predicting is guessing what will happen.

zamboni_keepplaying.content: Do you want to keep playing?
